project_abstract.cdata: The Road Sector Project consists of the Government's 1986-1988 Road Investment and Maintenance Program. This program includes construction; reconstruction; upgrading; routine, periodic and deferred maintenance; consulting and training services and procurement of road maintenance equipment.
